last_episode_to_air.name: The Easy Way or The Hard Way
last_episode_to_air.overview: The truth is revealed but Gaizka's powerful family writes a new narrative. Omar and Edurne meet their inevitable fates. Juan gets another chance.

name: Victim Number 8
overview: An jihadist attack in the old town of Bilbao ends with the lives of seven people and leaves more than thirty badly injured. The police investigation focus on catching those responsible for the massacre.

episodes.name: Omar
episodes.overview: A terrorist bombing in downtown Bilbao kills seven and wounds dozens, wracking havoc in its wake. A young Muslim, Omar, is kidnapped and framed for it.

episodes.name: There Are No Miracles
episodes.overview: Gorka, one of the bombing victims, is eulogized by brother Gaizka, who has ties to the bombers. Omar escapes from his captors and is chased by the cops.

episodes.name: Starting to Believe
episodes.overview: Edurne, Omar's girlfriend, teams up with Juan, a journalist, to try to prove his innocence. Omar is once more kidnapped when he tries to surrender.

episodes.name: Coup de Grace
episodes.overview: Omar manages to get away and makes it to Madrid while Edurne, waiting for his surrender, is arrested as a collaborator.

episodes.name: A Bullshit Theory
episodes.overview: Edurne is freed to bait Omar. Police investigator Olaegi begins to suspect that intelligence agent Gorostiza is hiding something. Juan gathers clues.

episodes.name: A Mercenary Shark
episodes.overview: While Omar and Edurne meet, Juan begins to put the larger picture together. Gaizka barely keeps a grip on his company and a step ahead of Gorostiza.

episodes.name: Nesting Behavior
episodes.overview: Edurne and Omar arrange to flee Spain. Juan hits on proof that exculpates Omar. Gorostiza tries to recruit Olaegi, while her suspicions about him grow.

episodes.name: The Easy Way or The Hard Way
episodes.overview: The truth is revealed but Gaizka's powerful family writes a new narrative. Omar and Edurne meet their inevitable fates. Juan gets another chance.
